org.tinyradius.server

Class AcctHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinyradius.server.AcctHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestHandler<AccountingRequest>

    public class AcctHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestHandler<AccountingRequest>
    A reference implementation of AccountingRequest handler that responds to all Accounting-Request with standard Accounting-Response.

      • handlePacket

        public io.netty.util.concurrent.Promise<RadiusPacket> handlePacket(io.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                                   AccountingRequest accountingRequest,
                                                                   java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress,
                                                                   java.lang.String sharedSecret)
        Constructs an answer for an Accounting-Request packet. This method should be overridden.
        Specified by:
        handlePacket in interface RequestHandler<AccountingRequest>
        Parameters:
        accountingRequest - Radius request packet
        channel - socket which received packet
        remoteAddress - remote address the packet was sent by
        sharedSecret - shared secret associated with remoteAddress
        Returns:
        clientResponse packet or null if no packet shall be sent
